channel.title: Đồ Uống – My wordpress

item.title: Nước suối
item.dc:creator: tranvietduc
item.description: Water is an indispensable ingredient for life, has a particularly important role to help the body's activities take place normally. In addition to filtered water, you can use mineral water products, handy bottled mineral water with you to provide water for the body anytime, anywhere.
item.content:encoded: Water is an indispensable ingredient for life, has a particularly important role to help the body's activities take place normally. In addition to filtered water, you can use mineral water products, handy bottled mineral water with you to provide water for the body anytime, anywhere.

item.title: Soda Chanh
item.dc:creator: tranvietduc
item.description: On hot summer days, there is nothing better than enjoying a cool glass of lemon soda, today I will share with you how to make this summer drink.
item.content:encoded: On hot summer days, there is nothing better than enjoying a cool glass of lemon soda, today I will share with you how to make this summer drink.

item.title: Pepsi

item.description: Pepsi is a carbonated drink, cool and refreshing
item.content:encoded: Pepsi is a carbonated drink, cool and refreshing

item.title: Soda Dâu
item.dc:creator: tranvietduc
item.description: Cool, sweet strawberry soda with fresh, eye-catching colors will be the ideal cooling drink on hot days.
item.content:encoded: Cool, sweet strawberry soda with fresh, eye-catching colors will be the ideal cooling drink on hot days.

item.title: Soda Cherry
item.dc:creator: tranvietduc
item.description: This carbonated cherry lemonade recipe uses only four real ingredients—cherries, lemons, soda, and sugar to create a healthy, alcohol-free cocktail. Simple Cherry syrup mixed with lime juice and carbonated mineral water to create a refreshing cool summer drink. The sweetness of cherries combined with soda and fresh lemonade create a different flavor for summer.
item.content:encoded: This carbonated cherry lemonade recipe uses only four real ingredients—cherries, lemons, soda, and sugar to create a healthy, alcohol-free cocktail. Simple Cherry syrup mixed with lime juice and carbonated mineral water to create a refreshing cool summer drink. The sweetness of cherries combined with soda and fresh lemonade create a different flavor for summer.

item.title: Soda Nho
item.dc:creator: tranvietduc
item.description: The refreshing sour grape soda with the aroma of ripe purple grapes promises to be a great drink for the whole family on hot summer days. Soda made from grapes with cool sour taste and pleasant aroma from ripe purple grapes promises to be a great drink for the whole family on hot summer days.
item.content:encoded: The refreshing sour grape soda with the aroma of ripe purple grapes promises to be a great drink for the whole family on hot summer days. Soda made from grapes with cool sour taste and pleasant aroma from ripe purple grapes promises to be a great drink for the whole family on hot summer days.
